One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Lower-Division F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Upper-Division C cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
